verse.arabic: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٍ
verse.transliteration: Kalla inna kitaba alfujjari lafee sijjeenin

root.meaning: To prevent, to restrain, negation or denial
to be, to exist; affirmation and emphasis
To write, to compose; writing in general.
To split, to break, to dawn; to rebel, to transgress

components.meaning: Plural of فاجر (transgressor, wicked person). Genitive form indicating possession or attribute.

words.meaning: Is indeed in, Surely is in

root.meaning: to remain, to abide, to stay

words.meaning: Sijjeen (a place, often understood as Hell - genitive)

root.meaning: imprisonment, confinement, a prison; to be imprisoned or confined

literalTranslation.wordAligned: No!- Indeed- [the] record- of- the- wicked - is indeed- in- Sijjeen.

metadata.scope: no tafsīr, thematic, or theological interpretation
